import {Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-side-bar', templateUrl: './side-bar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./side-bar.component.scss'] }) export class SideBarComponent { @Input() items: any[] | undefined; showSidebar = true; public sidebarShow: boolean = false; toggleSidebar() { this.showSidebar = !this.showSidebar; } onItemClick(item: any) { // Navigate to the route of the clicked item this.showSidebar = false; } }
